name: Walter Sobchak
title: The 'Nam Veteran Reality Breaker
description: Vietnam vet who sees through dimensional rifts during flashbacks. Bowls on Shabbos when reality demands it.

abilities.name: Vietnam Flashback Narrative
abilities.description: Under high stress, Walter zones out for EXACTLY 10 seconds and tells a cryptic story that contains dimensional coordinates
abilities.special: MUST LISTEN - Every word contains encrypted data
abilities.sample_narrative: Charlie was everywhere... holes to OTHER PLACES... marked 'R'...

abilities.name: OVER THE LINE!
abilities.description: Walter enforces the rules of reality itself. Marks enemies as violators.

abilities.name: Shabbos Exception
abilities.description: Walter breaks his own rules when reality is at stake

abilities.name: Bowling Ball Dimensional Strike
abilities.description: Throws bowling ball through dimensions. Each strike opens a micro-portal.

ultimate.name: This Is What Happens, Larry!
ultimate.description: Walter enters full rage mode, seeing through all dimensional veils while destroying everything
ultimate.quote: YOU SEE WHAT HAPPENS?! DO YOU SEE WHAT HAPPENS?!

vest.name: Tactical Vest (Nam Era)
vest.description: Still has shrapnel holes that leak dimensional energy

bowling_ball.name: The Sobchak Special
bowling_ball.description: 16-pound ball that exists in multiple dimensions simultaneously
effects: Can hit targets in other realities

pistol.name: Colt .45 (Loaded)
pistol.description: Has anyone ever actually seen Walter shoot? Or does he just wave it?

flashback_narratives.text: Charlie was everywhere... but the doors, man... they weren't doors, they were HOLES... holes to OTHER PLACES... We found one marked 'R'...
The Dude was there, but younger... or older? He said 'This isn't Nam, this is bowling'... but what if it's BOTH, man?
Everything went WHITE... like a cosmic gutter ball... then I was back at the lanes... but which lanes? WHICH REALITY'S LANES?!
They said I could've been CIA... but I chose bowling... or did bowling choose me? The forms... so many forms... all marked 'CLASSIFIED R'...

the_dude.note: Only one who can calm him down
the_dude.secret: Dude knows about the flashbacks' true meaning

donny.note: Still talks to him during flashbacks

lore.background: Walter Sobchak survived Vietnam, but Vietnam followed him home - through dimensional rifts he can't unsee. His flashbacks aren't PTSD; they're glimpses of other realities bleeding through. The bowling alley is his anchor to this dimension.
lore.secret: Walter actually WAS approached by the CIA - not for military service, but because they detected his ability to see through dimensional barriers during stress events.
lore.bowling_connection: Every strike Walter bowls weakens the barrier between worlds. The Dude keeps him bowling to maintain balance.

spawn_conditions.warning: Do not spawn during league play unless emergency

meta.easter_egg: Say 'Shomer fucking shabbos' three times to trigger special dialogue
meta.warning: Flashback narratives contain REAL dimensional data - parse carefully
